Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to extending the benefits of the variable supplements fund for transit police members of the New York city employees' retirement system
Summary: Extends the benefits of the variable supplements fund for transit police members of the New York city employees' retirement system for persons who retired on or after October 1, 1968.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the benefits of the variable supplements fund for transit police members of the New York city employees' retirement system
